archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0499
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a customer, I want to approve certain chargeable texts & calls outside my plan before the charging commences, so that I can have certainty of what I'm being charged

properties.value: Is it one setting for all text @ calls outside of plan or more? Assumption: related to micropurchases
SC, PC, PIM, OCS, CNS, OM

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
